item.title: Privacy Policy
item.dc:creator: muriona
item.content:encoded:
Who we are

Suggested text: Our website address is: http://localhost/sinergia.

Comments

Suggested text: When visitors leave comments on the site we collect the data shown in the comments form, and also the visitor’s IP address and browser user agent string to help spam detection.

An anonymized string created from your email address (also called a hash) may be provided to the Gravatar service to see if you are using it. The Gravatar service privacy policy is available here: https://automattic.com/privacy/. After approval of your comment, your profile picture is visible to the public in the context of your comment.

Media

Suggested text: If you upload images to the website, you should avoid uploading images with embedded location data (EXIF GPS) included. Visitors to the website can download and extract any location data from images on the website.

Cookies

Suggested text: If you leave a comment on our site you may opt-in to saving your name, email address and website in cookies. These are for your convenience so that you do not have to fill in your details again when you leave another comment. These cookies will last for one year.

If you visit our login page, we will set a temporary cookie to determine if your browser accepts cookies. This cookie contains no personal data and is discarded when you close your browser.

When you log in, we will also set up several cookies to save your login information and your screen display choices. Login cookies last for two days, and screen options cookies last for a year. If you select "Remember Me", your login will persist for two weeks. If you log out of your account, the login cookies will be removed.

If you edit or publish an article, an additional cookie will be saved in your browser. This cookie includes no personal data and simply indicates the post ID of the article you just edited. It expires after 1 day.

Embedded content from other websites

Suggested text: Articles on this site may include embedded content (e.g. videos, images, articles, etc.). Embedded content from other websites behaves in the exact same way as if the visitor has visited the other website.

These websites may collect data about you, use cookies, embed additional third-party tracking, and monitor your interaction with that embedded content, including tracking your interaction with the embedded content if you have an account and are logged in to that website.

Who we share your data with

Suggested text: If you request a password reset, your IP address will be included in the reset email.

How long we retain your data

Suggested text: If you leave a comment, the comment and its metadata are retained indefinitely. This is so we can recognize and approve any follow-up comments automatically instead of holding them in a moderation queue.

For users that register on our website (if any), we also store the personal information they provide in their user profile. All users can see, edit, or delete their personal information at any time (except they cannot change their username). Website administrators can also see and edit that information.

What rights you have over your data

Suggested text: If you have an account on this site, or have left comments, you can request to receive an exported file of the personal data we hold about you, including any data you have provided to us. You can also request that we erase any personal data we hold about you. This does not include any data we are obliged to keep for administrative, legal, or security purposes.

Where your data is sent

Suggested text: Visitor comments may be checked through an automated spam detection service.

item.title: Home
item.dc:creator: muriona
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row height="full" valign="center" color_scheme="secondary" us_bg_image="977" us_bg_repeat="no-repeat" us_bg_parallax="vertical" us_bg_overlay_color="rgba(0,0,0,0.6)" bg_type="image" bg_override="ex-full" parallax_content="parallax_content_value" seperator_enable="seperator_enable_value" seperator_type="xlarge_triangle_seperator" seperator_position="bottom_seperator" seperator_svg_height="140" seperator_shape_background="#ffffff" ult_hide_row="off" css=".vc_custom_1482422109256{padding-bottom: 70px !important;}" el_id="home"][vc_column el_class="align_center"][us_single_image image="1813" size="us_600_0"][us_separator][vc_custom_heading text="Research Group on Sustainable Energy Innovation" font_container="tag:h3|font_size:35|text_align:center|line_height:1.1" google_fonts="font_family:Lato%3A100%2C100italic%2C300%2C300italic%2Cregular%2Citalic%2C700%2C700italic%2C900%2C900italic|font_style:300%20light%20regular%3A300%3Anormal"][us_separator][us_btn text="about us" link="url:%2F%23about|||" color="white" target=""][us_btn text="our aim" link="url:%2F%23aim|||" target=""][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row bg_type="bg_color" seperator_enable="seperator_enable_value" seperator_type="xlarge_triangle_seperator" seperator_position="bottom_seperator" seperator_svg_height="100" seperator_shape_background="#ffffff" css=".vc_custom_1483478147465{padding-bottom: 50px !important;}" el_id="about"][vc_column animate="afb" el_class="align_center"][vc_column_text]

ABOUT SINERGIA

[/vc_column_text][us_separator size="huge"][vc_column_text]
Sinergia is the Group on Sustainability and Innovation in Renewable Energies from the Federal University of Santa Catarina (UFSC) with researchers from the Florianopolis Campus, Blumenau Campus and from other Institutions from Brazil and overseas. It is oriented at studying the major global transitions that shape our time, which is: the energy transition towards renewables and the sustainability transitions towards clean technologies. Its research aims at understanding how such transitions can speed up; analyzing the current techno-economic paradigms shaping energy and sustainability transitions, and proposing new and/or better solutions and policies towards its goal.
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row us_bg_image="1816" us_bg_parallax="vertical" bg_type="bg_color" seperator_enable="seperator_enable_value" seperator_type="xlarge_triangle_seperator" seperator_position="bottom_seperator" seperator_svg_height="100" seperator_shape_background="#ffffff" css=".vc_custom_1536181570012{padding-bottom: 50px !important;}" el_id="aim"][vc_column animate="afb" el_class="align_center"][vc_column_text]

OUR AIM

[/vc_column_text][us_separator size="huge"][vc_column_text]

Our aim is to contribute in speeding up the transition to a sustainable and cleaner energy society

[/vc_column_text][us_separator][us_btn text="View Our Team" link="url:%23team||" style="outlined" size="18px" icon="fas|users" target=""][us_btn text="View our Partners" link="url:%23partners|||" style="outlined" size="18px" icon="far|comments" target=""][us_separator size="huge"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row el_id="blog"][vc_column animate="afb"][vc_column_text]

SINERGIA NEWS

[/vc_column_text][us_separator][us_grid type="masonry" columns="3" items_gap="2px" items_quantity="3" items_layout="1789" img_size="us_600_0" filter=""][vc_empty_space height="10px"][us_btn text="Go to News" link="url:%2Fblog%2F" style="outlined" color="light" align="center" target=""][us_separator size="small"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row width="full" el_id="research"][vc_column animate="afb"][vc_column_text css_animation="bottom-to-top"]

OUR RESEARCH

Our research looks for answers to a more sustainable energy transition by studying how renewable energies are developed, diffused and deployed in Brazil and other developing countries. We do so by applying different tools, methodologies and theoretical frameworks.
[/vc_column_text][us_separator size="large"][us_grid post_type="us_portfolio" orderby="date_asc" columns="4" items_gap="4px" items_quantity="4" items_layout="1790" img_size="us_600_0" breakpoint_1_width="px" breakpoint_1_cols="" breakpoint_2_width="px" breakpoint_2_cols="" breakpoint_3_width="px" breakpoint_3_cols="" filter=""][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row color_scheme="alternate" el_id="approach"][vc_column][vc_column_text]

OUR APPROACH

[/vc_column_text][us_separator type="short" size="small" icon="fas|chevron-down"][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner animate="afb" width="1/3"][us_iconbox icon="fas|globe" style="outlined" iconpos="left" size="28px" title="Innovation Systems" external=""]The Innovation Systems approach give the overall framework by which renewable energy diffusion is a complex issue which depends not only of technological factors but also of political, economic and social ones. [/us_iconbox][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner animate="afb" width="1/3"][us_iconbox icon="fas|chart-area" style="outlined" iconpos="left" size="28px" title="System Dynamics" external=""]Systems dynamics modeling enables both a qualitative and a quantitative understanding of complex issues, allowing to find answers at different analytical levels. [/us_iconbox][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner animate="afb" width="1/3"][us_iconbox icon="fas|binoculars" style="outlined" iconpos="left" size="28px" title="Future Studies" external=""]Through foresight, it offers a lense of multiple possible and viable scenarios which are the outcome of decisions and policies at present time and which can influence the future in different ways. [/us_iconbox][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][us_iconbox icon="fas|file-alt" style="outlined" iconpos="left" size="28px" title="Bibliometrics" external=""]Bibliometrics and scientometrics allow to assess quantitatively the state of art of a specific scientific field. In the case of renewable energy technologies, advances are seen constantly and therefore it is important to keep pace of them. [/us_iconbox][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][us_iconbox icon="fas|copy" style="outlined" iconpos="left" size="28px" title="Patents Analysis" external=""]Patent counts help assessing the state of technological development of a particular technology. It can measure the performance of the innovation system by means of the growth of patenting.[/us_iconbox][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][us_iconbox icon="far|chart-bar" style="outlined" iconpos="left" size="28px" title="ABM" external=""]Agent-based Modeling allows to elicit agents micro-behavior, such as of consumers of a renewable energy technology. It can be used in conjunction by system dynamics in order to develop robust hibrid models.[/us_iconbox][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row height="huge" color_scheme="secondary" us_bg_image="1007" us_bg_repeat="no-repeat" us_bg_parallax="still" us_bg_overlay_color="rgba(45,34,23,0.64)" el_id="team"][vc_column animate="afb"][vc_column_text]

OUR TEAM

Our team is composed by undergraduate students, master students, doctoral students, post-docs, national and international colleagues with competencies and skills in the various theoretical frameworks, methodologies and tools we use, such as system dynamics, innovation systems, foresight and bibliometrics.
[/vc_column_text][us_separator size="large"][us_grid post_type="us_testimonial" type="carousel" orderby="rand" columns="3" items_quantity="" items_layout="testimonial_1" carousel_arrows="1" carousel_dots="1" carousel_autoplay="1" carousel_interval="5"][us_separator][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row height="small" color_scheme="custom" el_id="partners"][vc_column animate="afb"][vc_column_text]

OUR PARTNERS

[/vc_column_text][us_logos columns="6" with_indents="1" orderby="rand" carousel_arrows="1" carousel_dots="1" carousel_autoplay="1" items="%5B%7B%22image%22%3A%221281%22%2C%22link%22%3A%22url%3Ahttp%253A%252F%252Fwww.ppgep.ufsc.br%7C%7Ctarget%3A%2520_blank%7C%22%7D%2C%7B%22image%22%3A%221191%22%7D%2C%7B%22image%22%3A%221331%22%2C%22link%22%3A%22url%3Ahttp%253A%252F%252Fwww.iseesystems.com%7C%7Ctarget%3A%2520_blank%7C%22%7D%2C%7B%22image%22%3A%221347%22%2C%22link%22%3A%22url%3Ahttp%253A%252F%252Fwww.capes.gov.br%7C%7Ctarget%3A%2520_blank%7C%22%7D%2C%7B%22image%22%3A%221333%22%2C%22link%22%3A%22url%3Ahttp%253A%252F%252Fwww.cnpq.br%7C%7Ctarget%3A%2520_blank%7C%22%7D%2C%7B%22image%22%3A%221349%22%2C%22link%22%3A%22url%3Ahttp%253A%252F%252Fwww.lalics.org%7C%7Ctarget%3A%2520_blank%7C%22%7D%2C%7B%22image%22%3A%221354%22%2C%22link%22%3A%22url%3Ahttps%253A%252F%252Fsites.google.com%252Fsite%252Fsystemdynamicsbrazilorg%252F%7C%7Ctarget%3A%2520_blank%7C%22%7D%2C%7B%22image%22%3A%221357%22%2C%22link%22%3A%22url%3Ahttps%253A%252F%252Fwww.lemp.ufsc.br%7C%7Ctarget%3A%2520_blank%7C%22%7D%5D"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row height="huge" color_scheme="secondary" us_bg_image="977" us_bg_parallax="vertical" us_bg_overlay_color="rgba(0,0,0,0.7)" el_id="contact"][vc_column animate="afb"][vc_column_text]

CONTACT US

[/vc_column_text][us_separator][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][us_contacts address="FAPEU Building, 3rd Floor. Federal University of Santa Catarina. Campus UFSC-Trindade. Florianopolis. SC. 88040-900. Brazil. Geo Coordinates: -27.600228, -48.519396" phone="+55.48.3721.2922"][us_separator size="large"][us_social_links gap="0" items="%5B%7B%22type%22%3A%22email%22%2C%22url%22%3A%22sinergia%40contato.ufsc.br%22%7D%2C%7B%22type%22%3A%22facebook%22%2C%22url%22%3A%22http%3A%5C%2F%5C%2Ffacebook.com%5C%2Fsites%5C%2FsinergiaUFSC%22%7D%2C%7B%22type%22%3A%22twitter%22%2C%22url%22%3A%22http%3A%5C%2F%5C%2Ftwitter.com%5C%2Fsinergia_UFSC%22%7D%5D"][us_separator size="small"][us_separator size="small"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="2/3"][us_image_slider ids="1825,1827" nav="dots" transition="crossfade" img_fit="contain"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Uriona
item.dc:creator: muriona
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row height="full" valign="center" color_scheme="custom" us_text_color="#000000" us_bg_image="1004" us_bg_repeat="no-repeat" us_bg_parallax="vertical" us_bg_overlay_color="rgba(247,247,247,0.6)" bg_type="image" bg_override="ex-full" parallax_content="parallax_content_value" seperator_enable="seperator_enable_value" seperator_type="xlarge_triangle_seperator" seperator_position="bottom_seperator" seperator_svg_height="140" seperator_shape_background="#ffffff" ult_hide_row="off" css=".vc_custom_1484172098048{padding-bottom: 70px !important;}" el_id="home"][vc_column el_class="align_center"][vc_custom_heading text="Prof. Mauricio Uriona Maldonado" font_container="tag:h2|font_size:45|text_align:center|line_height:1.1" google_fonts="font_family:Lato%3A100%2C100italic%2C300%2C300italic%2Cregular%2Citalic%2C700%2C700italic%2C900%2C900italic|font_style:700%20bold%20regular%3A700%3Anormal"][vc_custom_heading text="Site Pessoal" font_container="tag:h3|font_size:35|text_align:center|line_height:1.1" google_fonts="font_family:Lato%3A100%2C100italic%2C300%2C300italic%2Cregular%2Citalic%2C700%2C700italic%2C900%2C900italic|font_style:300%20light%20regular%3A300%3Anormal"][us_separator][us_btn text="sobre" link="url:%2Furiona%2F%23sobre|||"][us_btn text="ensino" link="url:%2Furiona%2F%23ensino|||" target=""][us_btn text="pesquisa" link="url:%2Furiona%2F%23pesquisa|||" target=""][us_btn text="contato" link="url:%2Furiona%2F%23contato|||"][us_separator][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row color_scheme="custom" us_bg_color="#ffffff" us_text_color="#000000" us_bg_overlay_color="rgba(255,255,255,0.6)" el_id="sobre"][vc_column width="1/4"][us_person image="1069" name="Mauricio Uriona Maldonado" role="Adjunct Professor"][/us_person][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_column_text]

SOBRE

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]Mauricio Uriona Maldonado é Professor de Simulação/Prospecção de Cenários e Estudos da Ciência, Tecnologia e Inovação no Departamento de Engenharia de Produção e Sistemas da UFSC e docente do Programa de Pós-graduação em Engenharia de Produção (área Gestão de Operações) da mesma instituição. Ele também participa como co-orientador nos programas de pós-graduação em Engenharia Mecânica (UFSC) e Ciência da Informação (UFSC). Prof. Uriona-Maldonado também tem sido professor visitante em diferentes instituições com destaque à Universität Bremen (Alemanha), University of Tampere (Finlândia), Universidad Autonoma de Madrid (Espanha) e tem realizado cursos na área de simulação no Massachussetts Institute of Technology (EUA) e na área de ciência, tecnologia e inovação na University of Tampere (Finlândia). Ele é graduado em Engenharia Industrial pela Escuela Militar de Ingenieria (Bolívia) e Mestre e Doutor em Engenharia e Gestão do Conhecimento pela UFSC. No Doutorado teve co-orientação pela Duke University (EUA). Mauricio já atuou como consultor em gestão da inovação da Federação da Indústrias de Santa Catarina (FIESC), participou em projetos nos setores de Energia, Software e Telecom financiados pela Fundação de Amparo a Pesquisa de Santa Catarina (FAPESC), 7th Framework Programme da União Europeia e a Coordenação de Aperfeiçoamento de Pessoal de Nível Superior (CAPES). As pesquisas do Prof. Mauricio têm sido publicadas em journals internacionais de prestígio e apresentadas em conferências especializadas ao redor do mundo. Atualmente coordena pesquisas relacionadas com a simulação e prospecção de cenários de difusão de novas tecnologias de energia renovável, notadamente, a energia solar fotovoltaica, energia eólica e veículos elétricos.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/4"][vc_row_inner content_placement="middle"][vc_column_inner][us_iconbox icon="fab|facebook-f" color="custom" style="circle" icon_color="" bg_color="#ffffff" size="30px" link="url:http%3A%2F%2Ftwitter.com%2Fmuriona|||"][/us_iconbox][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][us_separator][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner][us_iconbox icon="fab|researchgate" color="custom" style="circle" icon_color="" bg_color="" size="30px" icon="fab|linkedin" color="custom" style="circle" icon_color="" bg_color="#ffffff" size="30px" link="url:https%3A%2F%2Fbr.linkedin.com%2Fin%2Furiona|||"][/us_iconbox][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][us_separator][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner][us_iconbox color="custom" style="circle" height="full" valign="center" color_scheme="alternate" bg_type="bg_color" seperator_enable="seperator_enable_value" seperator_type="xlarge_triangle_seperator" seperator_position="bottom_seperator" seperator_svg_height="140" seperator_shape_background="#ffffff" ult_hide_row="off" css=".vc_custom_1482863432583{padding-bottom: 70px !important;}" el_id="ensino"][vc_column el_class="align_center"][vc_column_text]

ENSINO

[/vc_column_text][us_separator type="default"][vc_column_text]

GRADUAÇÃO

[/vc_column_text][us_separator type="short" icon="fas|chevron-down"][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][us_iconbox icon="far|window-restore" style="outlined" iconpos="left" size="28px" title="Gestão Estratégica da TI" link="url:http%3A%2F%2Fsinergia.ufsc.br%2Furiona%2Feps7008%2F|||"]EPS7008 - Gestão Estratégica de Tecnologia de Informação[/us_iconbox][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][us_iconbox icon="fas|map-signs" style="outlined" iconpos="left" size="28px" title="Teoria da Decisão" link="url:http%3A%2F%2Fsinergia.ufsc.br%2Furiona%2Feps7009%2F|||"]EPS7009 - Teoria da Decisão[/us_iconbox][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][us_separator type="default"][vc_column_text]

PÓS-GRADUAÇÃO

[/vc_column_text][us_separator type="short" icon="fas|chevron-down"][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][us_iconbox icon="fas|chart-area" color="secondary" style="outlined" iconpos="left" size="28px" title="Simulação e Prospecção de Cenários" link="url:http%3A%2F%2Fsinergia.ufsc.br%2Furiona%2Fsdm%2F|||"]EPS 510035[/us_iconbox][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][us_iconbox icon="fas|globe" color="secondary" style="outlined" iconpos="left" size="28px" title="Inovação em Produtos, Processos e Serviços"]Breve descrição aqui...[/us_iconbox][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][us_iconbox icon="fas|desktop" color="secondary" style="outlined" iconpos="left" size="28px" title="Introdução a BPM (Business Process Management) " link="url:http%3A%2F%2Fsinergia.ufsc.br%2Furiona%2Fbpm%2F|||"]EPS510036[/us_iconbox][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row height="full" valign="center" el_id="pesquisa"][vc_column][us_separator][vc_column_text]

PESQUISA

As nossas pesquisas aplicam o conteúdo das disciplinas ofertadas de graduação e pós-graduação na área das energias renováveis. Particularmente, estamos interessados em propor soluções para uma maior difusão, no Brasil, das tecnologias solar, eólica e de fontes alternativas de combustível.
[/vc_column_text][us_separator type="fullwidth" icon="fas|chevron-down"][vc_column_text]

Veja a seguir as nossas áreas de pesquisa:

[/vc_column_text][us_separator size="small"][us_grid post_type="us_portfolio" orderby="rand" columns="4" items_gap="4px" items_quantity="4" items_layout="1777" img_size="us_600_0" breakpoint_1_width="px" breakpoint_1_cols="" breakpoint_2_width="px" breakpoint_2_cols="" breakpoint_3_width="px" breakpoint_3_cols=""][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner][us_separator size="small"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner][vc_column_text]

Veja a seguir as nossas publicações mais recentes:

[/vc_column_text][us_btn text="PUBLICAÇÕES" link="url:http%3A%2F%2Fsinergia.ufsc.br%2Fportfolio%2Fpublications%2F|||" align="center"][us_separator size="large"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_column_text]

NOSSA ABORDAGEM

[/vc_column_text][us_separator type="short" size="small" icon="fas|chevron-down"][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/4"][us_iconbox icon="fas|chart-area" style="outlined" iconpos="left" size="30px" title="Dinâmica de Sistemas"]Ferramenta de simulação que possibilita a geração e prospecção de cenários ajudando a encontrar as soluções e alternativas mais eficientes e custo-efetivas a partir de modelos quantitativos e qualitativos.[/us_iconbox][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/4"][us_iconbox icon="fas|globe" style="outlined" iconpos="left" size="30px" title="Sistemas de Inovação"]Nesta ótica, a inovação e a difusão de tecnologia depende de fatores sócio-econômicos, além dos puramente tecnológicos, além de atores públicos e privados e da legislação. A difusão de energias renováveis, portanto, precisa de um alinhamento efetivo entre eles.[/us_iconbox][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/4"][us_iconbox icon="fas|binoculars" style="outlined" iconpos="left" size="30px" title="Prospecção Tecnológica"]Estudos de futurização ou foresight possibilitam visualizar múltiplos futuros viáveis, com base em técnicas qualitativas e quantitativas e também os meios para modificar esses futuros a partir das ações do presente.[/us_iconbox][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/4"][us_iconbox icon="fas|search" style="outlined" iconpos="left" size="30px" title="Cientometria"]Visam avaliar a dinâmica evolutiva de um determinado campo de conhecimento, a partir de técnicas quantitativas e estatísticas. No caso das tecnologias, é evidente a importância de conhecer como a ciência por trás delas está se desenvolvendo, para logo poder direcioná-la ao caminho ou futuro desejado.[/us_iconbox][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][vc_column][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row el_id="contato"][vc_column][vc_column_text]

Geo-coordenadas: -27.601083, -48.517953" phone="+55.48.3721.7028"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="2/3"][us_image_slider ids="1829" transition="crossfade"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_column][us_social_links gap="0" align="center" items="%5B%7B%22type%22%3A%22email%22%2C%22url%22%3A%22m.uriona%40ufsc.br%22%7D%2C%7B%22type%22%3A%22twitter%22%2C%22url%22%3A%22twitter.com%5C%2Fmuriona%22%7D%2C%7B%22type%22%3A%22linkedin%22%2C%22url%22%3A%22https%3A%5C%2F%5C%2Fbr.linkedin.com%5C%2Fin%5C%2Furiona%22%7D%5D"][/vc_column]

item.title: portfolio-solar
item.dc:creator: muriona
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row height="full" gap="20" valign="center"][vc_column animate="afl" width="1/2"][us_separator type="invisible"][vc_column_text]

Solar Technology

The rapid increase of solar power generation and its continuing trend in the future call for new and multidisciplinary research approaches. In particular, we are interested in deepening the knowledge and understanding of the two mainstream solar technologies: solar PV and concentrating solar power (CSP) and on how they can be better deployed in Brazil and in other developing countries.[/vc_column_text][us_separator type="invisible" size="small"][us_btn text="More Info" link="url:%23section2" target=""][us_separator type="invisible"][/vc_column][vc_column animate="afr" animate_delay="0.2" width="1/2"][us_single_image image="1006" size="us_350_350_crop" img_link_new_tab=""][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row height="full" gap="20" valign="center" color_scheme="secondary" el_id="section2"][vc_column animate="afl" animate_delay="0.2" width="1/2"][us_single_image image="975" size="us_350_350_crop" img_link_new_tab=""][/vc_column][vc_column animate="afr" width="1/2"][us_separator type="invisible"][vc_column_text]

Solar PV Technology

New materials and advances in power generation have surrounded Solar PV Technology so far. Little, has been done, however, on the socio-technical aspects of its development, in particular in Brazil and other developing countries. Our research, in this sense, aims at uncovering the main inducing and blocking mechanisms from the social, technical and economic perspectives and in proposing policy advise on its diffusion.[/vc_column_text][us_separator type="invisible" size="small"][us_btn text="More Info" link="url:%23section3" color="white" target=""][us_separator type="invisible"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row height="full" gap="20" valign="center" el_id="section3"][vc_column animate="afl" width="1/2"][us_separator type="invisible"][vc_column_text]

Concentrating Solar Power (CSP)

CSP Technology has thrive in both developed and developing countries elsewhere, however, factors such as economics and policy have undermined its development and deployment in Brazil. We aim at understanding how can this technology become cost-effective and in doing so, how can it be better supported by policy.[/vc_column_text][us_separator type="invisible" size="small"][us_btn text="More Info" link="url:%23section4" color="secondary" target=""][us_separator type="invisible"][/vc_column][vc_column animate="afr" animate_delay="0.2" width="1/2"][us_single_image image="1409" size="us_350_350_crop" img_link_new_tab=""][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row color_scheme="secondary" el_id="section4"][vc_column][us_btn text="Next Project" link="url:%2Fportfolio%2Fportfolio-item-three%2F" style="outlined" color="white" size="18px" align="center" icon="fas|arrow-right" target=""][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: portfolio-afv
item.dc:creator: muriona
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row height="full" gap="20" valign="center"][vc_column animate="afl" width="1/2"][us_separator type="invisible"][vc_column_text]

Alternative Fuel Vehicles

  Alternative Fuel Vehicles (AFV) are a promising strategy for de-carbonizing the transport sector. There are many types of AFVs, including battery-powered electric vehicles, hybrid vehicles and fuel cell vehicles. Each one of these technologies offers specific advantages but also specific challenges for Brazil and other developing countries.[/vc_column_text][us_separator type="invisible" size="small"][us_btn text="More Info" link="url:%23section2" target=""][us_separator type="invisible"][/vc_column][vc_column animate="afr" animate_delay="0.2" width="1/2"][us_single_image image="1583" size="us_350_350_crop" img_link_new_tab=""][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row height="full" gap="20" valign="center" color_scheme="secondary" el_id="section2"][vc_column animate="afl" animate_delay="0.2" width="1/2"][us_single_image image="1585" size="us_350_350_crop" img_link_new_tab=""][/vc_column][vc_column animate="afr" width="1/2"][us_separator type="invisible"][vc_column_text]

Research

Our research is particularly interested in understanding the diffusion patterns of alternative fuel vehicles in Brazil, by taking into account the institutional and regulatory framework of the country, the product and service platform including, for instance, charging stations across the nation and the, both, successful and unsuccessful policies abroad.[/vc_column_text][us_separator type="invisible" size="small"][us_btn text="More Info" link="url:%23section3" color="white" target=""][us_separator type="invisible"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row height="full" gap="20" valign="center" el_id="section3"][vc_column animate="afl" width="1/2"][us_separator type="invisible"][vc_column_text]

Projects

We are currently developing two projects related to AFVs: 1) a PIBIC project which is focused on developing a system dynamics model and future scenarios on AFV diffusion; and 2) a Postdoc project which is focused on understanding the policies and regulatory framework in Brazil in order to propose more robust policies by using simulation.[/vc_column_text][us_separator type="invisible" size="small"][us_btn text="More Info" link="url:%23section4" color="secondary" target=""][us_separator type="invisible"][/vc_column][vc_column animate="afr" animate_delay="0.2" width="1/2"][us_single_image image="1586" size="us_350_350_crop" img_link_new_tab=""][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row height="full" gap="20" valign="center" color_scheme="primary" el_id="section4"][vc_column animate="afl" animate_delay="0.2" width="1/2"][us_single_image image="1589" size="us_350_350_crop" img_link_new_tab=""][/vc_column][vc_column animate="afr" width="1/2"][us_separator type="invisible"][vc_column_text]

Publications

We are currently finishing the revision of an article submitted to the Journal of Cleaner Production, with colleagues from UFSC. Also, several papers are being developed to be presented at conferences and to be submitted to journals in the forthcoming months.[/vc_column_text][us_separator type="invisible" size="small"][us_btn text="More Info" link="url:%23section5" color="white" target=""][us_separator type="invisible"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row color_scheme="secondary" el_id="section5"][vc_column][us_btn text="Next Project" link="url:%2Fportfolio%2Fportfolio-item-three%2F" style="outlined" color="white" size="18px" align="center" icon="fas|arrow-right" target=""][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: EPS7008 - Gestão Estratégica da Tecnologia de Informação
item.dc:creator: muriona
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]Objetivo:
Desenvolver as competências necessárias para analisar a gestão e implantação dos processos e sistemas de Tecnologia de Informação em geral e Gestão do Conhecimento em especifico, compreendendo as inter-relações com a estratégia corporativa, a competitividade e a tomada de decisão.
Ementa:
Competitividade; Empresas Inteligentes; Gerenciamento na Era da Informação; Gestão da Informação e o Suporte à Decisão; Tecnologias da Informação e GC; Tecnologia da Informação e Business Intelligence (BI); Plano de ação em Gestão do Conhecimento (GC); Implantação de Projetos de TI e GC.
Metodologia:
Aulas expositivas, ministradas pelo professor com a participação do aluno. O material didático bem como a comunicação entre professor e alunos dar-se-á via Moodle [www.moodle.ufsc.br]. Outras ferramentas de ensino serão disponibilizadas pelo professor ao longo do semestre, como por exemplo, o software Bizagi Process Modeler.
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][us_progbar title="Peso da Participação e Assistência" count="5" style="2" size="32px"][us_progbar title="Peso da Prova 01" count="25" style="2" size="32px"][us_progbar title="Peso da Prova 02" count="40" style="2" size="32px"][us_progbar title="Peso da Prova 03" count="30" style="2" size="32px"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/4"][us_btn text="Voltar" link="url:http%3A%2F%2Fsinergia.ufsc.br%2Furiona|||"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/4"][us_btn text="Slides" link="url:%20http%3A%2F%2Fsinergia.ufsc.br%2Furiona%2Feps7008%2Fslides-eps7008%2F|||"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/4"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/4"][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: portfolio-cleantech
item.dc:creator: muriona
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row height="full" gap="20" valign="center"][vc_column animate="afl" width="1/2"][us_separator type="invisible"][vc_column_text]

Clean Technologies and Tools

We are interested in studying how clean technologies and tools are used, in particular life-cycle analysis (LCA), eco-innovation, sustainable innovations, reverse logistics and closed-loop supply chains.[/vc_column_text][us_separator type="invisible" size="small"][us_btn text="More Info" link="url:%23section2" target=""][us_separator type="invisible"][/vc_column][vc_column animate="afr" animate_delay="0.2" width="1/2"][us_single_image image="1393" size="us_350_350_crop" img_link_new_tab=""][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row height="full" gap="20" valign="center" color_scheme="secondary" el_id="section2"][vc_column animate="afl" animate_delay="0.2" width="1/2"][us_single_image image="1395" size="us_350_350_crop" img_link_new_tab=""][/vc_column][vc_column animate="afr" width="1/2"][us_separator type="invisible"][vc_column_text]

Life-cycle analysis (LCA)

LCA is a tool used to track and verify possible environmental impacts caused by products through manufacturing, consumption and end-of-life, creating alternatives to minimize or eliminate its negative effects to the environment.[/vc_column_text][us_separator type="invisible" size="small"][us_btn text="More Info" link="url:%23section3" color="white" target=""][us_separator type="invisible"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row height="full" gap="20" valign="center" el_id="section3"][vc_column animate="afl" width="1/2"][us_separator type="invisible"][vc_column_text]

Eco-innovation and Sustainable Innovations

Eco-innovations and sustainable innovations are a new way of visualizing innovation from a sustainable point-of-view. Designing products, processes, service, business models which are innovative while at the same time environmental  friendly is a challenge for most industries and sectors. We are interested in understanding how can innovations be created by reducing environmental risks, pollution and other negative outcomes in the use of resources (including energy).[/vc_column_text][us_separator type="invisible" size="small"][us_btn text="More Info" link="url:%23section4" color="secondary" target=""][us_separator type="invisible"][/vc_column][vc_column animate="afr" animate_delay="0.2" width="1/2"][us_single_image image="1394" size="us_350_350_crop" img_link_new_tab=""][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row height="full" gap="20" valign="center" color_scheme="primary" el_id="section4"][vc_column animate="afl" animate_delay="0.2" width="1/2"][us_single_image image="1396" size="us_350_350_crop" img_link_new_tab=""][/vc_column][vc_column animate="afr" width="1/2"][us_separator type="invisible"][vc_column_text]

Reverse Logistics and Closed-loop supply chains

It deals with the flows of material and information forward and backward the supply chain and all the aspects to ensure the safe return of products after consumption or after sale to the company's supply chain. Such complex networks offer difficulties when managing and designing its operations but offer as well, opportunities for new research, specially using quantitative methods such as bibliometrics or simulation.[/vc_column_text][us_separator type="invisible" size="small"][us_btn text="More Info" link="url:%23section5" color="white" target=""][us_separator type="invisible"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row color_scheme="secondary" el_id="section5"][vc_column][us_btn text="Next Project" link="url:http%3A%2F%2Fsinergia.ufsc.br%2Fportfolio-wind%2F|||" style="outlined" color="white" size="18px" align="center" icon="fas|arrow-right" target=""][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: EPS7009 - Teoria da Decisão
item.dc:creator: muriona
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]Objetivo:
Apresentar os fundamentos da Teoria da Decisão. Tanto os aspectos racionais de decisão sob incerteza e risco quanto os aspectos multicritério que interferem em processos de decisão.
Ementa:
Teoria Normativa de Decisão e Teoria Descritiva de Decisão. Estruturação de problemas de decisão; matriz e árvore de decisão; Princípio da Dominância; decisão sob incerteza. Decisão sob risco; princípio de Bernoulli; avaliação e levantamento da informação. Decisão com múltiplos critérios: função de valor, método AHP, métodos outranking; modelagem de alternativas, modelagem das influências do ambiente e modelagem de preferências.
Metodologia:
Aulas expositivas, ministradas pelo professor com a participação do aluno e atividades e trabalhos práticos que serão definidos ao longo do semestre; o material didático bem como a comunicação entre professores e alunos dar-se-á via moodle [www.moodle.ufsc.br]. Outras ferramentas de ensino serão disponibilizadas pelo professor ao longo do semestre, como por exemplo, o software Visual Promethee, Stella e outros.
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][us_progbar title="Peso da Participação e Assistência" count="5" style="2" size="32px"][us_progbar title="Peso da Prova 01" count="35" style="2" size="32px"][us_progbar title="Peso da Prova 02" count="35" style="2" size="32px"][us_progbar title="Peso das Atividades" count="25" style="2" size="32px"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][us_btn text="Voltar" link="url:http%3A%2F%2Fsinergia.ufsc.br%2Furiona|||"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][us_btn text="Slides" link="url:%20http%3A%2F%2Fsinergia.ufsc.br%2Furiona%2Feps7009%2Fslides-eps7009%2F|||"][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: EPS510036 - Introdução a BPM
item.dc:creator: muriona
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row][vc_column][vc_custom_heading text="Disciplina oferecida para o Mestrado e Doutorado em Engenharia de Produção" google_fonts="font_family:Lato%3A100%2C100italic%2C300%2C300italic%2Cregular%2Citalic%2C700%2C700italic%2C900%2C900italic|font_style:400%20regular%3A400%3Anormal"][vc_column_text]Objetivo:
Proporcionar uma visão e compreensão geral sobre o Gerenciamento de Processos de Negócio (Business Process Management - BPM). Busca-se capacitar os alunos sobre o uso do BPM para a melhoria de processos de negócio.  Serão abordadas todas as fases ou etapas que compõem o BPM.
Ementa:
Visão Sistêmica. Principais conceitos de BPM: tipos de processos: operacionais, de gerenciamento e de suporte, o ciclo do BPM (as fases do BPM). Identificação do Processo. Descoberta de Processos (AS-IS). Análise de Processos Qualitativa. Análise de Processos Quantitativa. Redesenho do Processo (TO-BE). Implantação de Processos. Monitoramento e Controle do Processo.
Metodologia:
Combinação de aulas expositivas, estudo e discussão de casos, apresentação de trabalhos (a partir de textos disponibilizados pelos professores) no formato de seminário e a realização de um artigo final, onde devem integrar-se o conhecimento adquiridos na disciplina com o de outras disciplinas do programa.
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][us_progbar title="Peso da Participação e Assistência" count="20" style="2" size="32px"][us_progbar title="Peso de Apresentação de Seminários" count="30" style="2" size="32px"][us_progbar title="Peso da Redação de Artigo Individual" style="2" size="32px"][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: EPS510035 - Simulação e Prospecção de Cenários
item.dc:creator: muriona
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row][vc_column][vc_custom_heading text="Disciplina oferecida para o Mestrado e Doutorado em Engenharia de Produção" google_fonts="font_family:Lato%3A100%2C100italic%2C300%2C300italic%2Cregular%2Citalic%2C700%2C700italic%2C900%2C900italic|font_style:400%20regular%3A400%3Anormal"][vc_column_text]Objetivo:
Capacitar o aluno nos conceitos relacionados com a modelagem e simulação. Capacitar o aluno na metodologia de simulação “dinâmica de sistemas”. Capacitar o aluno no uso de software especializado para o desenvolvimento de modelos de “dinâmica de sistemas”.
Ementa:
Definição de sistema e visão sistêmica, conceitos básicos de modelagem e simulação aplicada a problemas da engenharia e gestão. Modelagem e simulação discreta, modelagem e simulação contínua. Introdução à dinâmica de sistemas (DS), conceito de feedback e o efeito delay, processo de construção de modelos. Estruturação do problema. Definição das hipóteses dinâmicas: laços de reforço positivo, laços de balanceamento negativo, diagramas de laços causais (causal loop diagrams – CLD). Formulação e construção do modelo: estoques e fluxos, notação e diagramação de modelos, construção de equações matemáticas. Verificação (validação) do modelo. Formulação e avaliação de políticas (projeção de cenários).
Metodologia:
Combinação de aulas expositivas, estudo e discussão de casos, apresentação de trabalhos (a partir de textos disponibilizados pelo professor) no formato de seminário e a realização de um artigo final, onde devem integrar-se o conhecimento adquiridos na disciplina com o de outras disciplinas do programa. Além de aulas práticas no laboratório de informática, para desenvolver as competências de modelagem e simulação, utilizando softwares especializados. Outras ferramentas de ensino serão disponibilizadas pelo professor ao longo do semestre, como por exemplo, o software Stella e o software Vensim PLE.
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][us_progbar title="Peso da Participação e Assistência" count="20" style="2" size="32px"][us_progbar title="Peso de Apresentação de Seminários" count="30" style="2" size="32px"][us_progbar title="Peso da redação de artigo individual" style="2" size="32px"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]

Formulário 02 - Disciplina Isolada

Aplicações de Bibliometria e Análise de Conteúdo (ebook)

This e-book (in Portuguese) brings several applications of bibliometrics and content analysis in the industrial engineering domain, including some chapters devoted to renewable energies.[/vc_column_text][us_separator size="small"][us_btn text="Read now" link="url:https%3A%2F%2Fissuu.com%2Fcarolvaz6%2Fdocs%2Flivro_completo_10082017|||" target=""][us_separator][/vc_column][vc_column animate="afr" animate_delay="0.2" width="1/2"][vc_column_text]

Empreendedorismo, inovação e sustentabilidade

This e-book (in Portuguese) presents both theoretical and applied studies within the entrepreneurship-innovation-sustainability nexus. item.dc:creator: muriona
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row height="full" valign="center" color_scheme="custom" us_text_color="#000000" us_bg_overlay_color="rgba(247,247,247,0.6)" bg_type="image" bg_override="ex-full" parallax_content="parallax_content_value" seperator_enable="seperator_enable_value" seperator_type="xlarge_triangle_seperator" seperator_position="bottom_seperator" seperator_svg_height="140" seperator_shape_background="#ffffff" ult_hide_row="off" css=".vc_custom_1535982560971{padding-bottom: 70px !important;}" el_id="home"][vc_column el_class="align_center"][vc_custom_heading text="Profa. Caroline Rodrigues Vaz" font_container="tag:h2|font_size:45|text_align:center|line_height:1.1" google_fonts="font_family:Lato%3A100%2C100italic%2C300%2C300italic%2Cregular%2Citalic%2C700%2C700italic%2C900%2C900italic|font_style:700%20bold%20regular%3A700%3Anormal"][vc_custom_heading text="Site Pessoal" font_container="tag:h3|font_size:35|text_align:center|line_height:1.1" google_fonts="font_family:Lato%3A100%2C100italic%2C300%2C300italic%2Cregular%2Citalic%2C700%2C700italic%2C900%2C900italic|font_style:300%20light%20regular%3A300%3Anormal"][us_separator][us_btn link="url:%2Fvaz%2F%23sobre|||" text="sobre"][us_btn link="url:%2Fvaz%2F%23ensino|||" text="ensino" target=""][us_btn link="url:%2Fvaz%2F%23pesquisa|||" text="pesquisa" target=""][us_btn link="url:%2Fvaz%2F%23contato|||" text="contato"][us_separator][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row color_scheme="custom" us_bg_color="#ffffff" us_text_color="#000000" us_bg_overlay_color="rgba(255,255,255,0.6)" el_id="sobre"][vc_column width="1/4"][us_person image="1687" name="Caroline Rodrigues Vaz" role="Adjunct Professor"][/us_person][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_column_text]

SOBRE

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]Caroline Rodrigues Vaz é Professora Adjunta do Departamento das Engenharias, da Universidade Federal de Santa Catarina, Campus Blumenau e docente permanente do Programa de Pós-Graduação em Engenharia de Produção, UFSC Florianópolis. Pós-Doutora (PNPD/CAPES) pelo Programa de Pós-Graduação em Engenharia de Produção, área Gestão das Operações (2016 - 2018) e Doutora em Engenharia de Produção (CNPq) pela Universidade Federal de Santa Catarina (2016). Realizou o Doutorado Sanduíche (PDSE/CAPES) na Ecolé Nationale dEngenieurs de Tarbes (ENIT) França (2013). Possui Mestrado em Engenharia de Produção (2010), Especialização em Educação Científica e Tecnológica (2008), Especialização em Gestão Industrial: Produção e Manutenção (2009) e graduação em Tecnologia em Alimentos (2007), pela Universidade Tecnológica Federal do Paraná. Participa como pesquisadora no Núcleo de gestão e Sustentabilidade (NGS/UFSC) e do Laboratório de Empreendedorismo e Inovação (LEMPI/UFSC). As suas áreas de pesquisas são: Sustentabilidade, Eco-Inovação, Energias Renováveis e Logística Reversa. Trabalha fortemente com análise de revisão de literatura estruturadas, tais como: bibliometria, cientometria e análise de conteúdo. Tem publicado em periódicos de alto impacto tais como: Journal of Cleaner Production, Sustainability e IEEE Latin America Transitions. E tem apresentado o resultado de suas pesquisas em Congressos Nacionais e Internacionais. Além, de publicar livros e capítulos de livros nas áreas de pesquisa.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/4"][vc_row_inner content_placement="middle"][vc_column_inner][us_iconbox icon="fab|facebook-f" color="custom" style="circle" size="30px" link="url:http%3A%2F%2Ffacebook.com%2Fpages%2Fsei|||" bg_color="#ffffff"][/us_iconbox][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][us_separator][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner][us_iconbox icon="fab|twitter" color="custom" style="circle" size="30px" link="url:http%3A%2F%2Ftwitter.com%2FVazCarol27|||" bg_color="#ffffff"][/us_iconbox][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][us_separator][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner][us_iconbox icon="fab|researchgate" color="custom" style="circle" size="30px" link="url:https%3A%2F%2Fwww.researchgate.net%2Fprofile%2FCaroline_Vaz|||" bg_color=""][/us_iconbox][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][us_separator][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner][us_iconbox color="custom" style="circle" icon_color="#f2f3f5" size="30px" link="url:http%3A%2F%2Flattes.cnpq.br%2F2433439971272327|||" img="1191" bg_color="#ffffff"][/us_iconbox][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row height="full" valign="center" color_scheme="alternate" bg_type="bg_color" seperator_enable="seperator_enable_value" seperator_type="xlarge_triangle_seperator" seperator_position="bottom_seperator" seperator_svg_height="140" seperator_shape_background="#ffffff" ult_hide_row="off" css=".vc_custom_1482863432583{padding-bottom: 70px !important;}" el_id="ensino"][vc_column el_class="align_center"][vc_column_text]

ENSINO

[/vc_column_text][us_separator type="default"][vc_column_text]

GRADUAÇÃO

[/vc_column_text][us_separator type="short"][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][us_iconbox icon="fas|globe" style="outlined" size="28px" iconpos="left" title="Gestão Ambiental" link="|||"]BLU3800 - Gestão Ambiental[/us_iconbox][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][us_iconbox icon="fas|map-signs" style="outlined" size="28px" iconpos="left" title="Aspectos de Segurança" link="|||"]BLU3901 - Aspectos de Segurança[/us_iconbox][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][us_iconbox style="outlined" size="28px" iconpos="left" title="Engenharia da Qualidade"]BLU1706 - Engenharia da Qualidade[/us_iconbox][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][us_separator type="default"][vc_column_text]

PÓS-GRADUAÇÃO

[/vc_column_text][us_separator type="short"][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][us_iconbox icon="fas|globe" color="secondary" style="outlined" size="28px" iconpos="left" title="Inovação em Produtos, Processos e Serviços"]Breve descrição aqui...[/us_iconbox][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][us_iconbox icon="fas|desktop" color="secondary" style="outlined" size="28px" iconpos="left" title="Estudos avançados em inovação e empreendedorismo " link="|||"][/us_iconbox][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row height="full" valign="center" el_id="pesquisa"][vc_column][us_separator][vc_column_text]

PESQUISA

As nossas pesquisas aplicam o conteúdo das disciplinas ofertadas de graduação e pós-graduação na área das energias renováveis. Particularmente, estamos interessados em propor soluções para uma maior difusão, no Brasil, das tecnologias solar, eólica e de fontes alternativas de combustível.
[/vc_column_text][us_separator type="fullwidth"][vc_column_text]

Veja a seguir as nossas áreas de pesquisa:

[/vc_column_text][us_separator size="small"][us_grid post_type="us_portfolio" orderby="rand" items_quantity="4" items_layout="1777" columns="4" items_gap="4px" img_size="us_600_0" breakpoint_1_width="px" breakpoint_1_cols="" breakpoint_2_width="px" breakpoint_2_cols="" breakpoint_3_width="px" breakpoint_3_cols=""][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner][us_separator size="small"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner][vc_column_text]

Veja a seguir as nossas publicações mais recentes:

[/vc_column_text][us_btn link="url:http%3A%2F%2Fsinergia.ufsc.br%2Fpubs%2F|||" align="center" icon="fas|archive" text="PUBLICAÇÕES"][us_separator size="large"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_column_text]

NOSSA ABORDAGEM

[/vc_column_text][us_separator size="small" type="short"][/vc_column][vc_column][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][us_iconbox icon="fas|truck" style="outlined" size="30px" iconpos="left" title="Logística Reversa"]A logística reverse refere-se ao processo de recuperação e coleta de itens obsoletos ou usados para seu reaproveitamento.[/us_iconbox][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][us_iconbox icon="fas|search" style="outlined" size="30px" iconpos="left" title="Cientometria"]Visam avaliar a dinâmica evolutiva de um determinado campo de conhecimento, a partir de técnicas quantitativas e estatísticas. No caso das tecnologias, é evidente a importância de conhecer como a ciência por trás delas está se desenvolvendo, para logo poder direcioná-la ao caminho ou futuro desejado.[/us_iconbox][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][us_iconbox icon="fas|globe" style="outlined" size="30px" iconpos="left" title="Inovação Sustentável"]Nesta ótica, a inovação e a difusão de tecnologia depende de fatores sócio-econômicos, além dos puramente tecnológicos, além de atores públicos e privados e da legislação. A difusão de energias renováveis, portanto, precisa de um alinhamento efetivo entre eles.[/us_iconbox][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row el_id="contato"][vc_column][vc_column_text]

CONTATO

[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][us_contacts address="Universidade Federal de Santa Catarina. Campus Blumenau. Rua João Pessoa 2514. Sala C305. Bairro Velha. Blumenau. SC. Brasil. CEP 89036-004" phone="+55.48.3721.3377" email="caroline.vaz@ufsc.br"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="2/3"][us_image_slider ids="1831,1827"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text][us_social_links gap="0" align="center" items="%5B%7B%22type%22%3A%22email%22%2C%22url%22%3A%22caroline.vaz%40ufsc.br%22%7D%5D"][/vc_column_text][/vc_column]

item.title: Uriona-eng
item.dc:creator: muriona
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row height="full" valign="center" color_scheme="custom" us_text_color="#000000" us_bg_image="1004" us_bg_repeat="no-repeat" us_bg_parallax="vertical" us_bg_overlay_color="rgba(247,247,247,0.6)" bg_type="image" bg_override="ex-full" parallax_content="parallax_content_value" seperator_enable="seperator_enable_value" seperator_type="xlarge_triangle_seperator" seperator_position="bottom_seperator" seperator_svg_height="140" seperator_shape_background="#ffffff" ult_hide_row="off" css=".vc_custom_1484172098048{padding-bottom: 70px !important;}" el_id="home"][vc_column el_class="align_center"][vc_custom_heading text="Prof. Mauricio Uriona Maldonado" font_container="tag:h2|font_size:45|text_align:center|line_height:1.1" google_fonts="font_family:Lato%3A100%2C100italic%2C300%2C300italic%2Cregular%2Citalic%2C700%2C700italic%2C900%2C900italic|font_style:700%20bold%20regular%3A700%3Anormal"][vc_custom_heading text="Personal webpage" font_container="tag:h3|font_size:35|text_align:center|line_height:1.1" google_fonts="font_family:Lato%3A100%2C100italic%2C300%2C300italic%2Cregular%2Citalic%2C700%2C700italic%2C900%2C900italic|font_style:300%20light%20regular%3A300%3Anormal"][us_separator][us_btn text="about" link="url:%2Feng-uriona%2F%23about|||"][us_btn text="teaching" link="url:%2Feng-uriona%2F%23teaching|||" target=""][us_btn text="research" link="url:%2Feng-uriona%2F%23research|||" target=""][us_btn text="contact" link="url:%2Feng-uriona%2F%23contact|||"][us_separator][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row color_scheme="custom" us_bg_color="#ffffff" us_text_color="#000000" us_bg_overlay_color="rgba(255,255,255,0.6)" el_id="about"][vc_column width="1/4"][us_person image="1069" name="Mauricio Uriona Maldonado" role="Associate Professor"][/us_person][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_column_text]

ABOUT

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]Welcome to my webpage! I am an Associate Professor at UFSC in the Department of Industrial and Systems Engineering, in Florianopolis, Brazil. My research interests are in Renewable Energy, Electric Vehicles, Sustainability Transitions, and System Dynamics modeling. My research uses a socio-technical systems perspective to study the complex transitions to low-carbon economies. I do so by using simulation modeling for policy testing and design. I have been a visiting scholar at Universität Bremen (Germany), University of Tampere (Finland), Universidad Autonoma de Madrid (Spain). Besides my formal training, I have been trained in system dynamics at the Massachusetts Institute of Technology (USA) and in innovation economics at the University of Tampere (Finland). My previous project experience span the Energy, Software and Telecom sectors. I earned my PhD in Knowledge Management and Engineering at UFSC with co-supervision at Duke University (USA). Before joining UFSC, I was a consultant in innovation management at the Federação da Indústrias de Santa Catarina (FIESC). Find my full cv here (in Brazilian format) and the international format, here.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/4"][vc_row_inner content_placement="middle"][vc_column_inner][us_iconbox icon="fab|facebook-f" color="custom" style="circle" icon_color="" bg_color="#ffffff" size="30px" link="url:http%3A%2F%2Ffacebook.com%2Fpages%2Fsei|||"][/us_iconbox][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][us_separator][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner][us_iconbox icon="fab|twitter" color="custom" style="circle" icon_color="" bg_color="#ffffff" size="30px" link="url:http%3A%2F%2Ftwitter.com%2Fmuriona|||"][/us_iconbox][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][us_separator][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner][us_iconbox icon="fab|researchgate" color="custom" style="circle" icon_color="" bg_color="" size="30px" link="url:https%3A%2F%2Fwww.researchgate.net%2Fprofile%2FMauricio_Uriona_Maldonado|||"][/us_iconbox][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][us_separator][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner][us_iconbox icon="fab|linkedin" color="custom" style="circle" icon_color="" bg_color="#ffffff" size="30px" link="url:https%3A%2F%2Fbr.linkedin.com%2Fin%2Furiona|||"][/us_iconbox][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][us_separator][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner][us_iconbox color="custom" style="circle" icon_color="#f2f3f5" bg_color="#ffffff" size="30px" link="url:http%3A%2F%2Flattes.cnpq.br%2F6929645347412345|||" img="1191"][/us_iconbox][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row height="full" valign="center" color_scheme="alternate" bg_type="bg_color" seperator_enable="seperator_enable_value" seperator_type="xlarge_triangle_seperator" seperator_position="bottom_seperator" seperator_svg_height="140" seperator_shape_background="#ffffff" ult_hide_row="off" css=".vc_custom_1559310317274{padding-bottom: 70px !important;}" el_id="teaching"][vc_column el_class="align_center"][vc_column_text]

TEACHING

[/vc_column_text][us_separator type="default"][vc_column_text]

UNDERGRADUATE COURSES

[/vc_column_text][us_separator type="short" icon="fas|chevron-down"][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][us_iconbox icon="far|window-restore" style="outlined" iconpos="left" size="28px" title="Strategic IT Management" link="url:http%3A%2F%2Fsinergia.ufsc.br%2Furiona%2Feps7008%2F|||"]EPS7008 - Gestão Estratégica de Tecnologia de Informação[/us_iconbox][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][us_iconbox icon="fas|map-signs" style="outlined" iconpos="left" size="28px" title="Decision Analysis" link="url:http%3A%2F%2Fsinergia.ufsc.br%2Furiona%2Feps7009%2F|||"]EPS7009 - Teoria da Decisão[/us_iconbox][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][us_separator type="default"][vc_column_text]

GRADUATE COURSES

[/vc_column_text][us_separator type="short" icon="fas|chevron-down"][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][us_iconbox icon="fas|chart-area" color="secondary" style="outlined" iconpos="left" size="28px" title="Simulation and Scenario Modeling" link="url:http%3A%2F%2Fsinergia.ufsc.br%2Furiona%2Fsdm%2F|||"]EPS 510035[/us_iconbox][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][us_iconbox icon="fas|globe" color="secondary" style="outlined" iconpos="left" size="28px" title="Product, process and service innovation"]Breve descrição aqui...[/us_iconbox][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][us_iconbox icon="fas|desktop" color="secondary" style="outlined" iconpos="left" size="28px" title="Business Process Management" link="url:http%3A%2F%2Fsinergia.ufsc.br%2Furiona%2Fbpm%2F|||"]EPS510036[/us_iconbox][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row height="full" valign="center" el_id="research"][vc_column][us_separator][vc_column_text]

RESEARCH

My current research interests have led me investigate how countries transition from high- to low-carbon and resource efficient economies. I study these transitions in the fields of renewable energy and electric mobility by:
  • assessing governance processes,
  • evaluating policy instruments and business models, and
  • exploring policy scenarios for sustainable futures by means of computer modeling.
[/vc_column_text][us_separator type="fullwidth" icon="fas|chevron-down"][vc_column_text]

See our research themes:

[/vc_column_text][us_separator size="small"][us_grid post_type="us_portfolio" orderby="rand" columns="4" items_gap="4px" items_quantity="4" items_layout="1777" img_size="us_600_0" breakpoint_1_width="px" breakpoint_1_cols="" breakpoint_2_width="px" breakpoint_2_cols="" breakpoint_3_width="px" breakpoint_3_cols=""][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner][us_separator size="small"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner][vc_column_text]

My recent (selected) publications:

  • Product-service systems in solar PV deployment programs: What can we learn from the California Solar Initiative? 2019. RESOURCES CONSERVATION AND RECYCLING, with J. Schmidt and O. Possamai;
  • The impact of CO2 mitigation policies on light vehicle fleet in Brazil. 2019. ENERGY POLICY, with L. Benvenutti and L. Campos;
  • Innovation system policy analysis through system dynamics modelling: a systematic review. 2018. Science and Public Policy, with S. Grobbelaar;
  • Diffusion of photovoltaic technology in Germany: A sustainable success or an illusion driven by guaranteed feed-in tariffs?. 2018. ENERGY, with L. Baur;
  • A functions approach to improve sectoral technology roadmaps. 2017. TECHNOLOGICAL FORECASTING AND SOCIAL CHANGE, with C. Haddad;
  • Long term diffusion dynamics of alternative fuel vehicles in Brazil. 2017. JOURNAL OF CLEANER PRODUCTION, with L. Benvenutti and A. Ribeiro.
[/vc_column_text][us_separator size="large"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_column_text]

OUR METHODS

[/vc_column_text][us_separator type="short" size="small" icon="fas|chevron-down"][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="2/6"][us_iconbox icon="fas|chart-area" style="outlined" iconpos="left" size="30px" title="System Dynamics"]Simulation modeling tool and method for policy testing and design. It allows testing the long-term impact of policies.[/us_iconbox][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="2/6"][us_iconbox icon="fas|globe" style="outlined" iconpos="left" size="30px" title="Sustainability Transitions"]It is our theoretical framework to study transitions to sustainable energy sources. They are long-term transformation processes of established industries, socio-technical systems and societies to more sustainable modes of production and consumption.[/us_iconbox][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="2/6"][us_iconbox icon="fas|search" style="outlined" iconpos="left" size="30px" title="Sysmap"]Our method to conduct integrative and comprehensive literature reviews including ingredients from Scientometrics and Systematic Review methods.[/us_iconbox][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][vc_column][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row el_id="contact"][vc_column][vc_column_text]

CONTACT

[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][us_contacts address="Department of Industrial and Systems Engineering. First Floor, room 27. Federal University of Santa Catarina. Address: Campus UFSC. Florianópolis. SC. 88040-900. Brazil. Geo-coordinates: -27.601083, -48.517953" phone="+55.48.3721.7028"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="2/3"][us_image_slider ids="1829" transition="crossfade"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_column][us_social_links gap="0" align="center" items="%5B%7B%22type%22%3A%22email%22%2C%22url%22%3A%22m.uriona%40ufsc.br%22%7D%2C%7B%22type%22%3A%22twitter%22%2C%22url%22%3A%22twitter.com%5C%2Fmuriona%22%7D%2C%7B%22type%22%3A%22linkedin%22%2C%22url%22%3A%22https%3A%5C%2F%5C%2Fbr.linkedin.com%5C%2Fin%5C%2Furiona%22%7D%5D"][/vc_column]

item.title: Sample Page
item.dc:creator: muriona
item.content:encoded:
This is an example page. It's different from a blog post because it will stay in one place and will show up in your site navigation (in most themes). Most people start with an About page that introduces them to potential site visitors. It might say something like this:

Hi there! I'm a bike messenger by day, aspiring actor by night, and this is my website. I live in Los Angeles, have a great dog named Jack, and I like piña coladas. (And gettin' caught in the rain.)

...or something like this:

The XYZ Doohickey Company was founded in 1971, and has been providing quality doohickeys to the public ever since. Located in Gotham City, XYZ employs over 2,000 people and does all kinds of awesome things for the Gotham community.

As a new WordPress user, you should go to your dashboard to delete this page and create new pages for your content. Have fun!

item.title: portfolio-biogas
item.dc:creator: muriona
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row height="full" gap="20" valign="center"][vc_column animate="afl" width="1/2"][us_separator][vc_column_text]

Biogas Technology

  Biogas technology is a promising source of clean energy in Brazil. Success stories from Germany and other nations inspire to conduct in-depth studies on this energy source. Currently, we are developing research on biogas on different fronts: studying Biogas potential growth by means of simulation forecasting; analyzing the current and future barriers to adoption and the behavioral decision making of potential adopters; and studying the potential of biogas towards circular economy business models.[/vc_column_text][us_separator size="small"][us_btn text="More Info" link="url:%23section2" target=""][us_separator][/vc_column][vc_column animate="afr" animate_delay="0.2" width="1/2"][us_single_image image="1878" size="us_350_350_crop" img_link_new_tab=""][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row height="full" gap="20" valign="center" color_scheme="secondary" el_id="section2"][vc_column animate="afl" animate_delay="0.2" width="1/2"][us_single_image image="1880" size="us_350_350_crop" img_link_new_tab=""][/vc_column][vc_column animate="afr" width="1/2"][us_separator][vc_column_text]

Biogas generation potential

We are developing system dynamics model to forecast the aggregate adoption potential of biogas installed capacity[/vc_column_text][us_separator size="small"][us_btn text="More Info" link="url:%23section3" color="white" target=""][us_separator][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row height="full" gap="20" valign="center" el_id="section3"][vc_column animate="afl" width="1/2"][us_separator][vc_column_text]

Behavioral decision-making

We are studying the individual decision-making process to adopt biogas, by means of discrete choice experiments.[/vc_column_text][us_separator size="small"][us_btn text="More Info" link="url:%23section4" color="secondary" target=""][us_separator][/vc_column][vc_column animate="afr" animate_delay="0.2" width="1/2"][us_single_image image="1881" size="us_350_350_crop" img_link_new_tab=""][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row height="full" gap="20" valign="center" color_scheme="primary" el_id="section4"][vc_column animate="afl" animate_delay="0.2" width="1/2"][us_single_image image="1882" size="us_350_350_crop" img_link_new_tab=""][/vc_column][vc_column animate="afr" width="1/2"][us_separator][vc_column_text]

Biogas and circular economy

  Biogas is a potential source of new business models towards a circular economy. We are studying how and in what sense does biogas technology adoption can generate circular economy potentials.[/vc_column_text][us_separator size="small"][us_btn text="More Info" link="url:%23section5" color="white" target=""][us_separator][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row color_scheme="secondary" el_id="section5"][vc_column][us_btn text="Next Project" link="url:%2Fportfolio%2Fportfolio-item-three%2F" style="outlined" color="white" size="18px" align="center" icon="fas|arrow-right" target=""][/vc_column][/vc_row]
